author: Michaelawilliams28
body:
<!--

For Windows PowerShell 5.1 issues, suggestions, or feature requests please use the following link instead:
Windows PowerShell [UserVoice](https://windowsserver.uservoice.com/forums/301869-powershell)

This repository is **ONLY** for PowerShell Core 6 and PowerShell 7+ issues.

- Make sure you are able to repro it on the [latest released version](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases)
- Search the existing issues.
- Refer to the [FAQ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/FAQ.md).
- Refer to the [known issues](https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/scripting/whats-new/known-issues-ps6).

-->

## Steps to reproduce

```powershell
command
PS /home> test-connection google.com -Traceroute

```

## Expected behavior

```
Completed Traceroute
```

## Actual behavior

```
   Target: google.com                                                                                 

Hop Hostname                  Ping Latency Status           Source       TargetAddress                
                                      (ms)                                                            
--- --------                  ---- ------- ------           ------       -------------                
  1 0.0.0.0                      1       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14                
  1 0.0.0.0                      2       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14                
  1 0.0.0.0                      3       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14                
  2 0.0.0.0                      1       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14                
  2 0.0.0.0                      2       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14                
  2 0.0.0.0                      3       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14                
  3 0.0.0.0                      1       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14                
  3 0.0.0.0                      2       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14                
  3 0.0.0.0                      3       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14                
  4 0.0.0.0                      1       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14                
  4 0.0.0.0                      2       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14                
  4 0.0.0.0                      3       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
  5 0.0.0.0                      1       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
  5 0.0.0.0                      2       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
  5 0.0.0.0                      3       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
  6 0.0.0.0                      1       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
  6 0.0.0.0                      2       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
  6 0.0.0.0                      3       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
  7 0.0.0.0                      1       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
  7 0.0.0.0                      2       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
  7 0.0.0.0                      3       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
  8 0.0.0.0                      1       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
  8 0.0.0.0                      2       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
  8 0.0.0.0                      3       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
  9 0.0.0.0                      1       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
  9 0.0.0.0                      2       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
  9 0.0.0.0                      3       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
 10 0.0.0.0                      1       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
 10 0.0.0.0                      2       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
 10 0.0.0.0                      3       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
 11 0.0.0.0                      1       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
 11 0.0.0.0                      2       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
 11 0.0.0.0                      3       * TimedOut         pop-os       172.217.12.14
 12 172.217.12.14                1      10 Success          pop-os       172.217.12.14
 12 172.217.12.14                2      10 Success          pop-os       172.217.12.14
 12 172.217.12.14                3      12 Success          pop-os       172.217.12.14

```

## Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      7.1.0-preview.3
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    7.1.0-preview.3
OS                             Linux 5.4.0-7634-generic #38~1592497129~20.04~9a1ea2e-Ubuntu SMP Fri Jun 19 22:4…
Platform                       Unix
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0


```
## Notes
```
I could note find anyone reporting this issue, maybe I am mistaken.    
 I also tested with the preview 4 and had the same issue. Let me know if you have any questions. 
```

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body:
See here: https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/927

This is due to a limitation / missing handling in the .NET Core ping API. Until it is fixed, the cmdlet will be able to provide limited trace information at best.

comments.author: Michaelawilliams28
comments.body: Thanks for the quick reply. Hopefully they get this fixed soon. I am trying to make a cross platform script at work.

title: Test-Connection google.com -Traceroute (unexpected behavior )
